title: A treatise of libertie from Iudaisme, or An acknowledgement of true Christian libertie, indited and published by Iohn Traske: of late stumbling, now happily running againe in the race of Christianitie
author: Traske, John, d. ca. 1638.
publisher: Printed by W. Stansby, for N. Butter, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the pyde Bull, neere S. Austens gate,
notes: Running title reads: Libertie, from Iudaisme.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
